title: Monday Post Show (8-16-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (8-16-21)
description:
Bobby starts by talking if he’s liking the 2nd Season of Ted Lasso. Bobby talked about a brunch buffet that he and Caitlin went to yesterday. We also get into a discussion of random world records, friends we’ve been friends with since middle school and why it’s good to complain about things in house. Eddie talks about how his son is now a foodie. And we do word association with fast food restaurants. Bobby also addresses a question Mike D had if we are living in the end of times…

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby starts by talking if he’s liking the 2nd Season of Ted Lasso. Bobby talked about a brunch buffet that he and Caitlin went to yesterday. We also get into a discussion of random world records, friends we’ve been friends with since middle school and why it’s good to complain about things in house. Eddie talks about how his son is now a foodie. And we do word association with fast food restaurants. Bobby also addresses a question Mike D had if we are living in the end of times…
